name: A-mazing (TwinGhosts)
description:
A remake of one of my first games ever. 

Try to reach the end of each stage as fast as possible and test your skills in the higher difficulties! Your best times will be stored locally.

Hard stages aren't finished yet and there is no audio at the moment.
I forgot to change the HTML5 export settings, so some sprite will have weird colors.

Controls

W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to move.

T to toggle the timer

R to restart the current stage

P to bring up the pause menu
